### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5), boiler (position -4.5, 24.0), and offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(0, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(5, 5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that there are no obstructions in the path when attempting to connect pipes. Move any obstructing entities before making the connection.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.

### Errors related to power connections
- Verify that all power connections are properly established to avoid entities being marked as not connected to the power network. Check the proximity of power sources to the entities that require power.
